name: 豪运
summary: Lucky is a small time criminal and he's happy just getting byuntil heagrees to look after some counterfeit money for a friend who isin a bitof trouble with the law Two months go by without a word fromhim so Luckyburns the 'funny money' to avoid problems for himself. Theresultingfire means a trip to the emergency room where he meets Bridgetand hischarm has her agreeing to go out...
